name: StreamTuner2  ♪♬#
short_description:
Streamtuner2 is an internet radio station and video browser. Lists music stations in categories. Launches your preferred media apps for playback. Currently provides channel frontends for:

  * Shoutcast.com
  * MyOggRadio.org
  * Xiph.org
  * Jamendo.com
  * Internet-Radio.com
  * TuneIn.com
  * http://SurfMusic.de/
  * http://iCast.io/
  * ModArchive.org
  * YouTube.com
  * http://Radio-Browser.info/
  * SomaFM.com
  * Live365.com
  * https://www.apple.com/itunes/itunes-radio/
  * http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/Internetradio/Stationen
  * Filtermusic, Dirble, PublicRadioFan, Delicast, di.fm, sky.fm, jazzradio.com, WindowsMedia, ListenLive, Magnatune, etc.

It's modelled after the original StreamTuner 0.99, but now implemented in Python. And there's a self-contained PyZIP package now, easily runnable without installation per `python streamtuner2.pyz`

Source repo: http://fossil.include-once.org/streamtuner2/
Announcements: http://freshcode.club/projects/streamtuner2

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
